abstract: Sloane Stephens defeats Elena Vesnina to win Volvo Car Open title; other tennis news noted.

headline.print_headline: Third Win of Year for Stephens
headline.main: Third Win of Year for Sloane Stephens at Volvo Car Open

snippet: The American Sloane Stephens outlasted Elena Vesnina to capture her third Women’s Tennis Association title this year.
lead_paragraph: The American Sloane Stephens outlasted Elena Vesnina to capture her third Women’s Tennis Association title this year.
